QuestData.Title: Healing with Roses
QuestData.Description: Between the battles, one might almost believe that there was hope for peace in this land. Sadly, that is not to be our fate.$B$BTravel to the Steppe of Life in southwestern Wintergrasp. I have need of the roses that grow there for salve to treat the wounded.$B$BSadly, the rose has become scarce due to the Alliance harvesting it too rapidly. Slay them on the Steppe of Life and retrieve their herb pouches from the bodies.$B$BIf that fails, perhaps a lasher or two might have one.
QuestData.LogDescription: Primalist Mulfort wants you to retrieve 10 Alliance Herb Pouches from Alliance players at the Steppe of Life.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to recover the herbs? The sick and wounded increase by the hour.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, this will go far to treat our soldier's wounds.
